comment.author: 40279093@N00
comment._content: I remember spending part of my Mozambique holiday here in 1960 and GRAND it was with the finest of architecture, sweeping staircases, fine carpets and antiques. It also had very fine dining. It had an Olympic size swimming pool and was situated close to the beach. I believe that after independence from Portugal it was converted into army barracks. I could look up my mother's diary if you would like more information
